entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 a.m. ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 1:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: SSW 18 km/h gust 28 km/h

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
